lead_paragraph: James (Kodi-Smit-McPhee) has shut himself off from his surroundings, falling into a world of imagination and darkness.  Visits with his psychiatrist (Danny Devito) have proven unhelpful– though he takes a liking to fellow patient, Val (Isabelle Fuh
